title: App stuck on initializing
body: I downloaded the Android app for my Galaxy J5 but when I log into it, it does that successfully but it just shows blank pages for everything. Messages, friend list, all that and where my summoner name should be it just says "initializing" and stays like that. Just frozen, can't do nothing about it. Help

replies.body:
Hello again!

We have just deployed a new version (1.3.36) to the play store. This should hopefully solve some of the issues you guys have seeing around the initializing state. Thank you all again for your patience and please let me know if this build is working better!

Hey guys. Just to keep you updated, I have found a cause of this issue (what I found is my best guess for why it is occurring for most people. If you still have the issue after this update please let me know). We had an incompatibility with some Samsung devices :( I am fixing the issue now, but it will take until next week for it to release. I appreciate your patience and will let you guys know when an update is ready. Sorry again
alright, didn't see this comment! thanks for the update! thanks so much, can't wait for the fix to be out.
Well. Same probleem here. It was working well last week. Reseted my phone to factory settings and now....nothing
Are you also having this problem on Android? Or on iOS?  We've been working to track this down, but nobody can make this happen here.  Mind helping us out on a couple questions?

I'm having these problems on Android.It says Initializing where my summoner name should be. None of the messages are showing either.  When I look at my friend's list, it tells me to add friends.  And when i click on my profile everything is blank.

Hey, we're trying to figure this out. Can you give me some extra information? 
1: Is it the account you posted with? (The Knights Vow on NA?)
2: What device are you using (for example Nexus 6p, or Samsung Galaxy S7)
3: Is it still happening and had it worked in the past? Did it stop working after doing something specifically?

Thanks for your help in tracking this down!

(and if anyone else with the same issue can provide me this info as well it would be great)

Yes, the accounts on NA and I'm using an Andriod. It's still happening and it has worked in the past. Before it was stuck on initializing It wouldn't allow me to send messages. As if i didn't have any connection, it was just pending. I think it stopped working after it updated, I'm not completely sure.

Are you also having this problem on Android? Or on iOS?  AS I just commented above, we've been working to track this down, but nobody can make this happen here.  Can you help us out on exactly what you see?
I have same problem on my Android Samsung phone..

I'm now getting a blank black screen when initializing the app.. it was working fine. I logged out and went to sign back in.. logo pops up then goes black. IOS Android HTC One m9. Forced app closed. Clear app cache. Uninstalled. Reinstalled. Restarted phone. Same issue. Halp!   This happened before but was fixed but it's back :(

having the same problem still! have an android galaxy s4 and i play on na. (Hymn of Valor)

earlier this week, it stopped sending messages, i assume it updated? so i reinstalled, cleared data/cache several times, and no matter what happens after a successful log in, it's stuck on initializing. 

i downloaded an apk of an older version and it worked fine, but i guess it updated on its own and now doesn't work. this is extremely annoying considering how much i use this app, so i'd love for this to be fixed
I have same problem. I re-install app. And now it's stuck Initializing. (Android, EUNE)

Hey ^^
Riot support told me to place this on the boards, but instead of creating a new one i'm going to post it here as these are the exact same issue i have.
I'm having the same issue ever since Thursday ( 9th of March).
I'm using a Samsung galaxy s3 with android. No changes had been made and i never had any real problems before.
This is what happend:
The same account as i use here.
Thursday i received a message on the mobile app in one of my clubs, i wanted to respond, but my answers never made it into the chat, they kept pending. Usually when it's pending a bit longer than usual, i close the app and open it again, but that didn't work this time. Even after i logged in on the client and played a couple games, the messages i send on the mobile app never entered. In the evening i decided to try to re-log, and ever since it is stuck on initializing. I tried force stop, soft and hard reset on my phone and even de-installing and re-installing the app. None of this worked. it's  initializing for a week now. 

Yet on my bf's phone it is working without problems and he has a samsung galaxy s4 Lite. 
As far as i know, i didn't had an update, nor any changes in my settings. 
I did try to send this report through the mobile app bug reports also, but i'm not sure if that worked.
The only other thing i can say is, that i did had a similar kind of issue in the first couple days this mobile app was released, this was solved pretty fast though.

Same problem here, using Samsung Galaxy S4 Mini (GT-I9195) on Android (4.4.2), was working fine until I relogged due to messages never sending and since then been suck on initializing. ( http://i.imgur.com/VOyUD6z.png http://i.imgur.com/QDGT15p.png )

- Tried multiple accounts on both NA and EUW regions.
- Tried different internet connections.
- Reinstalled the app fresh from the Google Play store. (App version 1.3.35)

Been using the app since it was released and this is the first time encountering this specific problem.
I have the same problem,app stuck at intializing since the last update. (Android)
